sentences.en: As the enemy retreated, we were ordered to disengage.
sentences.cn: 当敌人退却时我们受命撤出战斗.

sentences.en: Consider ability to easily disengage peripheral devices and network.
sentences.cn: 应很容易拆卸周边装置和网路.

sentences.en: Disengage the blower motor wire harness from the wire harness retainer.
sentences.cn: 把吹风机马达线束从连线线束夹扣中脱离出来.

sentences.en: Disengage the clutch ( ie from the gear mechanism ) before changing gear.
Disengage the gears when you park the car.
Do you use housework as a way to disengage emotionally?
sentences.cn: 你用家务活去掩盖你的感情?

sentences.en: He accepted the invitation, but was later forced to disengage himself.
sentences.cn: 他接受了邀请, 但后来被迫失约.

sentences.en: He couldn't disengage himself from the pain of losing his family.
sentences.cn: 他深陷在失去亲人的痛苦之中,无法自拔.

sentences.en: I asked , struggling , meanwhile, to disengage myself.
sentences.cn: 我问, 同时拚命想把手挣脱.

sentences.en: I want to disengage myself from his influence; disengage the gears.
sentences.cn: 我想从他的影响中摆脱出来; 让我们摆脱困难.

sentences.en: If equipped, disengage two - way electrochromic mirror connector from wiring harness.
sentences.cn: 如果已配备, 从线束上拆开2路电铬视镜接头.

sentences.en: More vigorous action is needed to force the federal army to disengage.
sentences.cn: 需要更强有力的行动来迫使联邦军队撤军。

sentences.en: Press and hold the red button in to disengage the 24 hour gear.
sentences.cn: 压和在解开24小时齿轮方面握红的钮.

sentences.en: This will disengage the disc and spring assembly into individual components.
sentences.cn: 这样将把阀瓣和弹簧总成拆成独立的部件.

sentences.en: To engage or disengage a motor vehicle's clutch.
sentences.cn: 踩离合器踩上或未踩上机动车的离合器.

sentences.en: You put on your seatbelt and disengage the hand brake.
sentences.cn: 你戴上安全带,松开手闸.

trans.tran_en: to move so that you are not touching or holding someone

trans.tran_cn: 分开，解开，释放，使（部队）脱离战斗
